players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I investigated Bob and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Let's vote Bob out."
You: "I'm innocent and Diana made a mistake. I was just protecting Charlie last night."
Diana: "Bob, if you were protecting Charlie, why did Alice die? Your story doesn't add up. We have my investigation and your contradictory claim. Vote Bob."
Charlie: "Bob's defense doesn't make sense. If he was protecting me, Alice shouldn't have died. Diana's investigation is our only solid lead. I'm voting Bob."
